full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHEN PO'I SGO NAS DUS MIN GYI KHA CHAR BCAD PA'I MAN NGAG ME RLUNG 'KHYIL BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,` SER BSRUNG BA'I CHED DU GZHI BDAG GTOR MA GTONG TSUL GNYIS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,('DI NI KUN MKHYEN BLA MA 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJES RJE GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG DBANG CHOS KYI RGYA MTSO LA GNANG BA DANG, YANG RJE 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJES RJE GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG DBANG CHOS KYI RGYA MTSO LA GNANG BA DANG, YANG RJE 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I GSUNG SGOM PA RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG MCHOG GRUB KYIS ZIN THOR BKOD PA BZHIN, PHYAG LEN DANG DMIGS RIM SOGS LA BAR BGYIS TE BKOD PA YIN NO, ,DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHEN PO'I SGO NAS DUS MIN GYI KHA CHAR BCAD PA'I MAN NGAG ME RLUNG 'KHYIL BA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, KHYI LO CHAR BA HA CANG CHE SKABS DON GNYER BA 'GA' ZHIG GIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, ^ DHARMA BADZRA GYIS BRIS PA'O,, ,,)
